meaningMnemonic: Someone on a <radical>scooter</radical> has an <radical>axe</radical>, and they're getting <kanji>near</kanji> to you really fast! Oh no, they're so <kanji>close</kanji> now, you need to get out of here!
readingMnemonic: As they draw <kanji>near</kanji>, you recognize who is riding the scooter: the <reading>Kin</reading>g (きん) of England! Behind him, a bunch of his guards also on scooters and wielding axes appear and move <kanji>close</kanji> to you.
